data.actual_result: The profile card appears and is cut off, because it runs off the bottom of the screen, as shown by the attachment.
data.expected_result: The profile card will appear and be fully visible.
data.short_description: Having a long enough note on a user can cause their profile card to go off the bottom of the screen.
data.steps_to_repro: - Add a note to a user (make it several lines, like 8 or 9) - Scroll up chat enough so their icon is near the bottom of the chat window - Click on their profile icon
